compositeCheatsheet.name: Create the Eclipse Browser RCP Application

taskGroup.name: Create the Eclipse Browser RCP application
taskGroup.intro:
This cheat sheet will guide you through the individual steps to create a standalone fully-branded Eclipse Browser product using the Plug-in Development Environment (PDE).
To assist you along the way, wizards and commands will be available for you to launch automatically.
taskGroup.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just created a standalone, fully-branded RCP product using PDE.

task.name: Create an RCP application
task.intro: This tutorial will demonstrate how to turn the Eclipse Browser plug-in into a minimal RCP application.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just create an RCP application for the Eclipse Browser plug-in!

task.name: Create an Eclipse Product
task.intro: This tutorial will demonstrate how to use the RCP tooling in PDE to create a fully-branded product.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! You created a fully-branded standalone Eclipse product!
